main event: A couple observed a brilliant green ball of fire falling from the sky while driving on the New York State Thruway.
interesting points: The object flashed green light at regular intervals of about one second apart.,The sighting occurred on 3 August 1958 around 2:30 AM GMT.,The object was described as being the size of a green traffic light.,Initial observation was in the East, and it disappeared in the West.,The couple doubted it was an aircraft flying low, suspecting it might be a meteor.
sighted object: a brilliant green ball of fire
witness description: couple driving West on the New York State Thruway
